snippet.title: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! - Extended Announcement Trailer | Switch
snippet.description:
Feel the rhythm! feel the rhyme! Pick up those Joy-Cons, it's drumming time! Check out the extended Announcement Trailer for Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! and pick it up on the eShop today:
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/taiko-no-tatsujin-drum-n-fun-switch

Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! comes to the Nintendo Switch on November 2, 2018.

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
